Description:
I N - J B100322/10 = 312346477
The 400V and 230V ac electrical sockets and associated fixed electrical wiring installation within your premises has not been constructed or maintained in a condition to prevent, so far as is reasonably practicable, danger.

IN - JB290322/02-34, 312393945 - You have failed to take effective measures to prevent access to dangerous parts of machinery, namely the crushing point between the machine bed and the punch tool and the shearing mechanism on your HSW 45 combination metalworking machine whilst in operation.

IN - JB290322/01-34, 312393976 - You have failed to make and give effect to such arrangements as are appropriate having regard to the nature of your activities for the effective control, monitoring and review of the preventative and protective measures required for the risks to your employees associated with your work activities.

IN - JB290322/03-34, 312394021 - You have failed to make and give effect to such arrangements as are appropriate having regard to the nature of your activities for the effective planning, organisation, control, monitoring and review of the preventative and protective measures required for the risks to your employees from the use of metalworking fluid.
